thread.title: Leaving jail, Puigdemont calls on Madrid to enter dialogue

title: Leaving jail, Puigdemont calls on Madrid to enter dialogue
text:
Leaving jail, Puigdemont calls on Madrid to enter dialogue Friday, April 06, 2018 - 01:02 
Former Catalan President Carles Puigdemont urged for the release of separatist leaders and called on Madrid to open a dialogue with the region as he left a German prison. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Former Catalan President Carles Puigdemont urged for the release of separatist leaders and called on Madrid to open a dialogue with the region as he left a German prison. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/04/06/leaving-jail-puigdemont-calls-on-madrid?videoId=415401638&videoChannel=13423
